I have a new question, there is an example how to add a menu item in Outlook?

When you have an email and click over this e-mail with right button, you have a menu, how to add an item to this menu?

 

Br,

 

Ricardo

NetOffice contains no example for custom context menus at the moment (but a good idea!)
the following links can be helpfull for you:

the old way:
http://www.outlookcode.com/codedetail.aspx?id=1777

the modern way:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/ee692172.aspx#OfficeOLExtendingUI_ContextMenuforaMailItem

this works also with NetOffice. i want to create an example at the weekend(its a realy good idea)

Sebastian
